text: La-Z-Boy s an American furniture manufacturer based in Monroe, Michigan, United States. It makes home furniture, including upholstered recliners, sofas, stationary chairs, lift chairs and sleeper sofas. The company employs more than 11,000 people. It was founded in 1927. Category:Retail companies of the United States Category:Furniture Category:1927 establishments in the United States
title: La-Z-Boy
